channel.title: jq on Will Schenk
channel.description: Recent content in jq on Will Schenk

item.title: Easy scraping with httpie and jq
item.description: I recently saw a tweet mentioning the combination of using HTTPie (a command line HTTP client), jq (a lightweight and flexible command-line JSON processor) and Gron (Make JSON greppable!) was “all you needed to build a scraper.” Lets see if that’s true. First install Linux: sudo apt-get install httpie jq OSX brew install httpie brew install jq Lets get some stars We can pull down the list of repositories people have starred on Github using the URL scheme https://api.
